item.description:
Join us for our first ever Breakfast Networking Meeting!

Tuesday, February 14, 2012 at the Wyndham Hotel

7:30 - 8:00AM - Open Networking

8:00 - 8:30AM - Breakfast/Networking

8:30 - 8:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 30 Seconds who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

8:45 - 9:15 - Presentation

9:15 - 9:30 Closing

The Best Pricing Strategies for 2012

How you’re going to increase your revenue in the upcoming year?

You want 2012 to rock, right?  Well, come learn the Best Pricing Strategies you can use to really bring in bigger income this year!

Walk away with a handy checklist to remind you of what you should be focusing on to make more, get off the income roller coaster and avoid the toughest of money situations

Presenter:  Maureen Campaiola

Certified Money Breakthrough Coach,  author, and speaker Maureen Campaiola is an internationally sought after money expert.

Known for her fearless, take charge approach Maureen delivers simple ways women entrepreneurs can change their relationship with money once and for all.  Maureen’s ground breaking work has helped hundreds of women create more income, eliminate their debt, and increase their confidence, so they can have the money, time and freedom in their life and business.

Maureen passionately and compassionately delivers her unique Break Through Your Money BS message that EVERY woman entrepreneur can and deserves to be debt free, live abundantly, spend wisely and invest smartly. 

Maureen is the perfect role model for creating more income in your business, a carefree way of life AND a debt free lifestyle.  For more information visit BreakThroughYourMoneyBS.com

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: Breakfast Networking Meeting
